org.htwk.graphplot.expression

Class StringTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.htwk.graphplot.expression.StringTransformer

  • public final class StringTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class shall help to perform basic string transformations in order to create a standardized string format for a correct interpretation of the string as expression.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sophie Eckenstaler, René Martin

      Construct an objects for the transformation of the given string.

      • getTransformedString

        public java.lang.String getTransformedString()
                                      throws InvalidExpressionException
        Finish the transformation of the given String and get a well formatted string.
        Returns:
        Formatted string
        Throws:
        InvalidExpressionException - is thrown if the given string does not represent a proper expression.

      • findAccordingBracket

        public static int findAccordingBracket(java.lang.String inputExpression,
                       int positionOfFirstBracket)
                                throws InvalidExpressionException
        This class finds an according opening or closing bracket in a mathematical term given as string.
        Parameters:
        inputExpression - The mathematical term as string
        positionOfFirstBracket - The position of the first bracket for which the according bracket shall be found
        Returns:
        The position of the opening or closing bracket in the given string
        Throws:
        InvalidExpressionException - is thrown if the given string does not represent a proper expression.
